languages.text: {n}Соломон словно невзначай приваливается к вам боком. Он большой, теплый, сильный... и очень грустный.{/n}
{n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон словно невзначай приваливается к вам боком. Он большой, теплый, сильный... и очень грустный.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは何気なく体を動かし、あなたに身体を寄せた。彼は大きくて、温かくて、強く…そして、とても、とても悲しかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは何気なく体を動かし、あなたに身体を寄せた。彼は大きくて、温かくて、強く…そして、とても、とても悲しかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich an dich. Er ist groß, warm, stark ... und unendlich traurig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich an dich. Er ist groß, warm, stark ... und unendlich traurig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'air de rien, Solomorne se décale imperceptiblement de manière à se coller contre vous. De sa forte carrure émane une grande chaleur... et une profonde tristesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'air de rien, Solomorne se décale imperceptiblement de manière à se coller contre vous. De sa forte carrure émane une grande chaleur... et une profonde tristesse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se reclina hasta apoyarse contra ti. Es grande, cálido, fuerte... y muy, muy triste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se reclina hasta apoyarse contra ti. Es grande, cálido, fuerte... y muy, muy triste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙不经意地换了个姿势，朝你靠了过来。他是那么魁梧、温暖、强壮……又是如此、如此悲伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙不经意地换了个姿势，朝你靠了过来。他是那么魁梧、温暖、强壮……又是如此、如此悲伤。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, yavaşça hareket ederek sana yaslanıyor. Cüsseli bedeni, sıcak ve güçlü olsaa da hüznünü ortaya koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne casually shifts so that he is leaning against you. He is big, warm, strong... and so, so sad.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne yavaşça hareket ederek sana yaslanır. Cüsseli bedeni sıcak ve güçlüydü ancak epey hüzünlüydü.{/n}
